sentence: Prominent at Trump’s rally was Kari Lake, his choice to dump Arizona Gov.
author: Jackie CalmesColumnist
title: Column: Biden’s first year is a chronicle of Republican obstruction and Trump’s shadow

sentence: For example, no matter who wins the Republican Senate primary in Arizona, the gubernatorial primary (Ducey is term-limited) will probably be won by a Trumpist lunatic named Kari Lake.
author: Steve M.
title: Is There Any Such Thing As An Unelectable Republican Now?

sentence: Greitens comments came one day after Trump's endorsed candidate for Arizona governor, Kari Lake, attacked Ronna Romney McDaniel, who remains as chairwoman of the RNC after being picked by Trump.
author: Bob Brigham
title: GOP civil war escalates as Republicans keep slamming each other in meaner and meaner terms
